title: Logging on then PVP.net Error
body:
I tried everything.
I tried all the fixes,full reinstalls,playing with my dns but i can't log in.
Please if someone knows another fix help me.

replies.body: If your client is having a hard time getting connected to pvp.net there might be something in your network settings that is blocking that connection. Let's go over the steps in this [**connection faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so that we can get to the bottom of what's blocking that link with pvp.net.
